Name: Infanticide | インファンティサイド
About the game: Infanticide is a horror walking simulator set in Japan. It's a short horror game. The play time is assumed to be about 0.5 to 1 hour. ■Story 'Take a closer look. There are children waiting for you. If you find suspected child abuse, please call us immediately.' ■Feature hard puzzle, walking simulator Realistic japan house design Unlike 'Alice | 愛莉澄', Infanticide is not an action game. One ending Psychological horror Gray Scale,Motion blur enabled ■Controll Walk：WASD Zoom：right click Light：left click Look：mouse Option：Esc ■Notes There are situations where keyboard operation is required. Please bring a keyboard.
